principles.title: Systematic Beauty
principles.desc: Governed by tokens, elevated by craft

typeScale.name: Code
typeScale.fontFamily: 'SF Mono', 'Monaco', 'Cascadia Mono', 'Roboto Mono', 'JetBrains Mono', 'Courier New', monospace

fonts.primary: 'SF Pro Text', 'SF Pro Display', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', 'Inter', 'Roboto', 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif

fonts.mono: 'SF Mono', 'Monaco', 'Cascadia Mono', 'Roboto Mono', 'JetBrains Mono', 'Courier New', monospace

hints.useTransform: Always animate transform (translate, scale, rotate) instead of top/left/margin
hints.useOpacity: Animate opacity instead of visibility for fade effects
hints.avoidExpensive: Never animate: width, height, padding, margin, border (causes layout)
hints.preferComposite: Stick to transform and opacity for 60fps animations

slideUp.name: slideUp
slideUp.definition: from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }

slideDown.name: slideDown
slideDown.definition: from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }

slideLeft.name: slideLeft
slideLeft.definition: from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); }

slideRight.name: slideRight
slideRight.definition: from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); }

scaleIn.name: scaleIn
scaleIn.definition: from { opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.95); } to { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1); }

scaleOut.name: scaleOut
scaleOut.definition: from { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1); } to { opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.95); }

noOpaqueContainers.check: Grep for background opacity in SVG containers
noOpaqueContainers.rule: Any background/fill on a scene container must be <= 0.30 alpha

noGhostStrokes.check: All SVG strokes/fills have opacity >= 0.06, strokeWidth >= 0.5

noSubFloorFonts.check: No fontSize below 11px in either style objects or SVG attributes
noSubFloorFonts.rule: Use navicueType tokens. Shell enforces floor as safety net.

buttonGeometry.check: All buttons use navicueButtonStyle() or navicueInteraction.button
buttonGeometry.rule: No hardcoded padding on buttons. Pill shape (9999px) always.

noEmDashes.rule: Use -- (double hyphen). Shell sanitizes as safety net.

noBareMonospace.rule: Shell sanitizes as safety net, but source should be correct.

useStagesHook.check: Import useNaviCueStages, not manual timer boilerplate
useStagesHook.rule: No manual timersRef pattern. Use addTimer from the hook.

shellWrapped.rule: No specimen renders without a shell (except Gen 1 legacy).

defaultExport.check: File uses export default function Series_DisplayName

noHardcodedColors.check: No raw hsla(), rgba(), or hex colors
noHardcodedColors.rule: Derive all colors from palette or themeColor(TH.*, alpha, offset)

useInteractionHooks.check: Hold, drag, type, draw interactions use the shared hooks
useInteractionHooks.rule: Reduces per-file complexity and ensures consistent UX.

stageTiming.rule: Total specimen duration should be 15-45s. Never over 60s.

cumulativeNarrative.reflectionTemplate: You have paused and chosen awareness {count} times. Each pause is a micro-decision that reshapes the default.
You have held presence {count} times across {daysSinceFirst} days. The physical structure of your nervous system is different today.
You have spoken {count} truths out loud. Hearing your own voice reshape a belief is different from reading it.
You have lifted your gaze {count} times. The act of looking up literally changes the posture of thought.
You have named and released {count} beliefs. The old pathway doesn't disappear, but the grip loosens each time.
You have reached out {count} times. Each reach rewires the isolation reflex into a connection reflex.

alternatives.during_crisis: I see you. Ride the wave. Zero shame.
alternatives.structural_validation: Given your source code, this makes complete sense.

magic_signature_schema.title: NaviCue Magic Signatures Schema
magic_signature_schema.description: Parametric definition of 8 magic signatures for NaviCue adaptive experience system
